build.beforeBuildCommand: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "try { Set-Location ../frontend; if (Get-Command cnpm -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { cnpm run build } else { npm run build } ; Set-Location ../backend ; if (-not (Get-Command pyinstaller -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { pip install pyinstaller } ; if (Test-Path requirements.runtime.txt) { $tmp = Join-Path $env:TEMP 'requirements.runtime.filtered.txt'; (Get-Content requirements.runtime.txt) | Where-Object { $_ -notmatch '^\s*qwen-tts\s*$' } | Set-Content $tmp ; pip install -r $tmp ; Remove-Item $tmp -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } elseif (Test-Path requirements.txt) { $tmp = Join-Path $env:TEMP 'requirements.full.filtered.txt'; (Get-Content requirements.txt) | Where-Object { $_ -notmatch '^\s*qwen-tts\s*$' } | Set-Content $tmp ; pip install -r $tmp ; Remove-Item $tmp -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } ; pip install torch==2.5.1+cpu torchvision==0.20.1+cpu --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu ; pip install torchaudio==2.5.1+cpu --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu ; pip install qwen-tts --no-deps ; pyinstaller --clean --distpath dist backend.spec ; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force ../src-tauri/resources | Out-Null ; Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Copy-Item -Force dist/superAutoCutVideoBackend.exe ../src-tauri/resources/ ; Write-Host 'Backend packaged and copied' } catch { Write-Error $_ ; exit 1 }"

security.csp: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' http://127.0.0.1:* http://localhost:* ws://127.0.0.1:* ws://localhost:*; img-src 'self' data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'
